video.title: Ocean Giants
video.synopsis: This series explores the lives of dolphins and whales, including the cognitive and social traits that make them unique among Earth’s species.

episodes.synopsis: The lives of the largest animals that have ever lived on Earth are explored in an up-close look at humpback and blue whales.
episodes.title: Giant Lives

episodes.synopsis: This look at dolphins demonstrates their great intelligence, as the big-brained sea creatures enjoy playing games and rapidly learn new skills.
episodes.title: Deep Thinkers

episodes.synopsis: Experts explain how dolphins and whales communicate with each other -- even while deep underwater -- using a variety of vocalizations and signals.
episodes.title: Voices of the Sea
